meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jayanthi Martins Emily Wilson Manny Abell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7611.

td.p: Jayanthi Martins, a finance manager from Austin, Texas
Emily Wilson, a nonprofit fundraising operations manager from Brooklyn, New York
Manny Abell, a Naval officer from Lacey, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,199)

tr.td: ALSO A FRIENDS CHARACTER
NEWBERY MEDAL WINNERS
AT THE "M"PORIUM
CAUGHT
WITH YOUR HAND
IN THE COOKIE JAR

TECHNOLOGY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents from the Computer History Museum in Mountain View, CA.) Seen here in a 2002 replica that\'s 7 feet high, 11 feet long and 5 tons, Difference Engine Number 2 was designed to remove human error from scientific tables; it was a groundbreaking computer concept by this British inventor back in the 1840s')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew presents from the Computer History Museum in Mountain View, CA.) Seen here in a 2002 replica that's 7 feet high, 11 feet long and 5 tons, Difference Engine Number 2 was designed to remove human error from scientific tables; it was a groundbreaking computer concept by this British inventor back in the 1840s
